document_data.name: ''Ravensong''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Ravensong''''' was a unique powerful [[enchanted]] [[sword]] from the ancient [[elf|elven]] city of [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Description: ''Ravensong'' was a [[longsword]] with a blade made of a type of dark-hued metal, and its handle was crafted in a shape of a [[raven]].
document_data.Powers: The weapons possessed a mighty ''+5'' enchantment, increased the wielder's dexterity, and honed their reflexes. This magic came at a price, however, as ''Ravensong'' reduced their willpower. Additionally, the sword allowed the wielder to cast ''[[feeblemind]]'' at will, and it held three charges of the [[spell]].
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, ''Ravensong'' belonged to a brigadier of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] that occupied the ruins of the City of Song on the orders of [[Kya Mordrayn]], a [[Wearer of Purple]].
